mean_en: the good feeling that you have when you have achieved something or when something that you wanted to happen does happen; something that gives you this feeling
sentence: I gave their service a good rating to show my satisfaction.
sentence_trans: 我给了好评来表示我对他们的服务很满意。
word_etyma: satis足够，饱足 + faction名词后缀 → satisfaction满足
